entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The team that is currently leading by eighty points to zero.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: The opposing team that is pulling back and has scored three goals.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: A Gryffindor supporter who vented his feelings by hitting the second Bludger directly at the offending Beater.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: An object that was hit by George Weasley.

entities.name: beater
entities.description: A position in the Quidditch team that is being targeted by George Weasley.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: Harry Potter's broomstick that is being praised for its precision-balance.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: The player who is riding the Firebolt and putting it through its paces.

entities.name: chang's comet
entities.description: A broomstick that is being compared to Harry Potter's Firebolt.

entities.name: jordan
entities.description: The commentator who is being scolded for advertising Firebolts.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: A player from Ravenclaw who has a chance to win the game if she gets the Snitch before Harry Potter.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The object that Cho needs to get in order for Ravenclaw to win.

entities.name: ravenclaw chaser
entities.description: A position in the Quidditch team that is being narrowly avoided by Harry Potter.

relationships.description: George Weasley targeted the Beater with a Bludger.
Harry Potter is riding the Firebolt.
A Ravenclaw Chaser narrowly avoided Harry Potter.
